name: Ultima Underworld II: Labyrinth of Worlds
notes:
- Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above)
- Fixed music not playing
- Keyboard layout image included in the game's folder.
- Digital footstep sounds are not working for an unknown reason.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer for Ultima Underworld 1 and 2 provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer for Ultima Underworld 1 and 2 provided by
    GOG
- innoextract: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
- conf: https://lutris.net/files/games/ultima-underworld-ii-labyrinth-of-worlds/uuw2_conf.zip
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/uw2/dosboxULTIMA2.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: innoextract
- execute:
    args: --extract $game --output-dir $CACHE/uw
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/uw2
    src: $CACHE/uw/app
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/uw2
    file: $conf
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/uw2/game.gog
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/uw2/dosboxULTIMA2.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
main_file: $GAMEDIR/uw2/dosboxULTIMA2_single.conf
